com.atermenji.android.iconicdroid

类 IconicFontDrawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • Drawable
      • com.atermenji.android.iconicdroid.IconicFontDrawable

  • public class IconicFontDrawable
extends Drawable
    A custom Drawable which can display icons from icon fonts.

    • 构造器概要

      • setContour

        public void setContour(int contourColor,
              int contourWidth)
        Set contour params for the Icon. You should call drawContour(boolean) method to enable contour.
        参数:
        contourColor -
        contourWidth -

      • setContourColor

        public void setContourColor(int contourColor)
        Set contour color for the Icon. You should call drawContour(boolean) method to enable contour.
        参数:
        contourColor -

      • setContourWidth

        public void setContourWidth(int contourWidth)
        Set contour width for the Icon. You should call drawContour(boolean) method to enable contour.
        参数:
        contourWidth -
